channel.title: Project SpiritQuest
channel.description:
Whats up ya'll its the maker of Spiritscape $Money Maker$
[center][b][size=10pt]Introduction[/size][/b][/center]
Well i decided to code a v2 and i realized a couple of my members are mad at me for not hosting v1 while im coding v2. The reason i started a v2 is because it started crashing, it also crashed for good, so no matter what you cant login :( so id like to make a server called SpiritQuest that my fellow players can play while i code v2.
[center][size=10pt][b]SpiritQuest[/b][/size][/center]
Spiritquest will be a server thats one, [size=10pt]BIG[/size], Quest. It involves delting quite a bit of runescape objects, adding a bunch of objects in werid place.
__________________________________________________________________________________________ -------------------------------------------My Idea-----------------------------------------------------__________________________________________________________________________________________
Alright so my idea is to make over 100 stages all over the runescape map, The Different stages will different tasks. During the whole entire quest, The players will be working to get 99 max stat. In the stages there will be like use item on object, use item on npcs and teleport them to different stages. And always an interface appearing and the begining of each stage. everyday someone who beats the quest will become mod and will be tested on the basics on the server. The mods will be allowed to ::xteleto (playername) and can help people along the quest.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------\/\/hy am i posting this?------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Why am i posting this?? I need a team of skill java server coders and client coders to help me code this server. A hoster that can host up to 40+ people or more. Ideas from people and put them into the server NOTE: I WILL ONLY BE ACCEPTTING 9 SERVER CODERS AND 5 Client CODERS AND 2 HOSTERS And 5TESTERS
So SIGN UP NOW BEFORE YOU CAN't.
I Am the Supervisor for everything
Server Coders: (Adminship on server) 1)Money Maker ( Blade9670 ) 2)Free Space 3)Free Space 4)Free Space 5)Free Space 6)Free Space 7)Free Space 8)Free Space 9)Free Space 10)Free Space
Client Coders: (Adminship)
1)Free Space 2)Free Space 3)Free Space 4)Free space 5)Free Space
Hosters: (Mods)
1)Free Space 2)Free space
Note: The hoster will be used only when the server is completed and must be No-ip crap
Testers: (Mods)
1)Free Space 2)Free Space 3)Free Space 4)Free Space 5)Free space
Note: tester will not be used until the server is half way done
If you'd like to appy for a position on SpiritQuest Post this application with the information needed.
[code] Moparscape Name: SpiritQuest Name: [can be the same as Moparscape name] Previous Experience: [Experience with java] MSN: [/code]
If you have any questions Please add me on msn
money_makerADMIN@hotmail.com
Thanks for reading!! :eek:

@blade9670 wrote:

Whats up ya’ll its the maker of Spiritscape $Money Maker$

[center][size=10pt]Introduction[/size][/center]

Well i decided to code a v2 and i realized a couple of my members are mad at me for not hosting v1 while im coding v2. The reason i started a v2 is because it started crashing, it also crashed for good, so no matter what you cant login so id like to make a server called SpiritQuest that my fellow players can play while i code v2.

[center][size=10pt]SpiritQuest[/size][/center]

Spiritquest will be a server thats one, [size=10pt]BIG[/size], Quest. It involves delting quite a bit of runescape objects, adding a bunch of objects in werid place.

-------------------------------------------My Idea-----------------------------------------------------__________________________________________________________________________________________

Alright so my idea is to make over 100 stages all over the runescape map, The Different stages will different tasks. During the whole entire quest, The players will be working to get 99 max stat. In the stages there will be like use item on object, use item on npcs and teleport them to different stages. And always an interface appearing and the begining of each stage. everyday someone who beats the quest will become mod and will be tested on the basics on the server. The mods will be allowed to ::xteleto (playername) and can help people along the quest.
